snippet: Track and field’s governing body will reintroduce four-year bans for serious drug violations in 2015.
abstract: Track and field’s governing body will reintroduce four-year bans for serious drug violations in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Track and field’s governing body will reintroduce four-year bans for serious drug violations in 2015.

headline.main: Drug Penalties to Stiffen for Track and Field
